title: Select Influencers for a Campaign
description: A marketing manager needs to identify and select 3-5 micro-influencers for a new product launch campaign.

tasks.description: Use an influencer marketing platform to search for influencers in a specific niche (e.g., 'home decor').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of potential influencer partners.

tasks.description: Analyze the potential influencers' audience demographics, engagement rates, and past brand collaborations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent vets the influencers to ensure they are a good fit for the brand.

tasks.description: Select the final list of 3-5 influencers and reach out to them with the campaign proposal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finalizes the list and initiates contact.
